summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 (NA) JEEP CHEROKEE. WHILE DRIVING 15 MPH, THE VEHICLE STALLED WITHOUT WARNING AND COMPLETELY LOST POWER. IN ADDITION, THE MALFUNCTION, ELECTRONIC THROTTLE CONTROL, AND ACC INDICATORS ILLUMINATED. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO JEEP, DODGE, CHRYSLER OF SIMI VALLEY, CALIFORNIA, BUT THE DEALER COULD NOT DUPLICATE OR DETERMINE THE CAUSE OF THE FAILURE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 110,093. ..UPDATED 08/30/17 *BF    *CN
